ğŸ› ï¸ Contribution Guidelines Summary

To maintain a clean and respectful workflow, please adhere to our contribution standards. More detail is available in the repository.

Commit Messages (Imperative)

  • Use Imperative Mood (e.g., `Add user model`).
  • Concise Summary on the first line.

Branching Model

  • Use short-lived feature branches.
  • Do not commit directly to the `main` branch.

PR Hygiene & Review

  • Requires minimum 2 approvals before merging.
  • Must include a link to the relevant Issue (`Closes #XX`).
